name: Ageth's Gaming Hall
description:
After another hard days work you drive by a Bar you've never seen before    

 - Ageth's Gaming Hall-

Maybe you can build a better life if you can just leave with your soul intact

Judgment comes in the form of coins.

 Better build up your coins

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Less aesthetic explanations:

Objective of game:

Play games to build up your coins & don't run out of coins or you lose your soul.

How many coins you have are displayed in the main menu

if you gather enough coins you can buy new tables

When you have 3 coins remaining it will be announced during play

Hover or tap the bottom left of the screen to go back to the main menu

Click or tap on menu options to select them

How to play:

  • Pachinko
  •   Controls: Spacebar/touch to drop or launch ball
  •  Objective: Try to Get your coin into the goal
  • Slots
  • Controls:  Spacebar/touch
  • Objective: Try to line up 3 in a row
  • Three Card Monte
  • Controls: Mouse/touch to select card
  • Spacebar/touch to mix cards up
  • Objective : After cards are mixed try to guess & select the correct card

Art/Sound/Everything-but-music created by me

Music credits go to the public & Jelly Roll Martin(RIP)

Shout-out to the Gdevelop Discord members for helping me make my game less esoteric, and for hosting a kick-ass jam!
